spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.description: Gain 10 defence until the start of your next turn. Until the start of your next turn, deal 2 damage disregarding defence to anyone that damages you.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Deal 8 damage disregarding defence to a target.

spells.name: Freeze
spells.description: Freeze a target until your next turn.

spells.name: Missile Spell
spells.description: Create 3 missiles that deal 1 damage each disregarding defence.

spells.name: Plant Armour
spells.description: A target gets +4 armour for 2 turns.

primaryWeapon.name: Mace
primaryWeapon.description: An iron mace with a smooth wooden handle

armour.name: Dragon Skin Cloak
armour.description: A magnificent cloak crafted from the hide of a dragon.
